title: DOJ Begins Surveillance of Washington Post Journalists Reporting on Russia Investigation
summary: Trump Justice Department initiates surveillance of Washington Post journalists Ellen Nakashima, Greg Miller, and Adam Entous, secretly obtaining phone records from April 15-July 31, 2017. Surveillance targets reporters investigating Russia interference, Kushner-Kislyak communications, and Sessions-Russian contacts, representing systematic effort to identify sources and suppress national security journalism.

sources.title: Trump Justice Department seized Post reporters phone records
